data.name: Runner Party
data.detailed_description:
A great tournament is organized in the brand new gameroom : Runner Party!



Come and challenge players from all over the world in this ultra dynamic "runner & platformer" through rich environments from Pop culture !

Train to master all the necessary techniques to dare and participate in ranked games and thus join the most prestigious leagues in the championship !

Power-ups, projectiles, traps, obstacles, everything will be done to give you or take away the victory !

In this game you are the champion: win and collect cards to get new skins!

Customize your character !

Show you're the best by earning amazing rewards that will make your opponents jealous !

Become a legend ! 3 ! 2 ! 1 ! Go !


Runner Party is in early access.
The game will evolve quickly and offer later

- 1 character editor
- Additional levels
- an AI to play alone
- Servers to play online
- A complete matchmaking system as well as many leagues

A great tournament is organized in the brand new gameroom : Runner Party!

data.short_description: A competitive Multiplayer running game up to 4 players (either on LAN or online) - Use traps and projectiles ! Make life difficult for your competitors ! - Slow down the enemy to get ahead ! - Get hit and you risk losing the race !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3 3220 3,30GHz 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 6500 3,60GHz 4 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 970/Radeon RX470 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
